metadata.title: CVE-2024-26889 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: hci_core: Fix possible buffer overflow struct hci_dev_info has afixed size name[8] field so in the event that hdev->name is bigger thanthat strcpy would attempt to write past its size, so this fixes thisproblem by switching to use strscpy.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
